verbs.description: life along the mohawk river through the years the mohawk river [V: can] be a paradise for boaters rowers anglers water skiers and even surfers but sometimes it can be a nightmare for those that live along its shores cathy luciano lama ithaca mohawk river schenectady new york lower rotterdam junction
